like I'm gonna win because I'm getting

and so if you're negotiating a

well I use this product and therefore

you have to do what I call a

if you create this big surface where

okay the brand says here's where I'm at
Point a here's where we're trying to get

um and so it's to strive to get to that
that type of relationship to the first
part of your question though about how
how do you protect yourself it's a real

anyone who is you know working with
Partners in a meaningful way on an

when I started I just like hired our

I was like Hey we're like starting to do

this we're going to do all these things
and so we felt protected like at least

done over 550 sponsorships with my wife
